definitions.definition: To mark or cover with lines ; to crisscross .
To purchase land so that the remaining adjacent sections are smaller than the minimum area purchasable as freehold , thus excluding potential freeholders.

main_definition: To mark or cover with lines ; to crisscross .
secondary_definitions: ( New Zealand , historical ) To purchase land so that the remaining adjacent sections are smaller than the minimum area purchasable as freehold , thus excluding potential freeholders.
